description: How the action unfolded as Ireland run in eight tries in defeating Italy in the Women's Six Nations.
title: Ireland hammer Italy 54-12 in Parma - as it happened
title_page: Women's Six Nations: Ireland hammer Italy 54-12 in Parma - as it happened - BBC Sport
maintext:
Arrivederci!
FT Italy 12-54 Ireland
It's an afternoon to remember for Ireland after putting the Italians to the sword at the Stadio Sergio Lanfranchi.
Anna McGann bagged a hat-trick among eight Irish tries and this performance will undoubtedly boost confidence for the rest of the Six Nations campaign.
We hope you enjoyed but that's all from us for now.
You can read our match report here
Thanks for your company.
